item.title: VLC. How to play all your Media through AirTunes Speakers
item.dc:creator: Anton Checkhov
item.content:encoded:
AirTunesÂ IP: 10.0.1.1 (replace it with yours)






  
To play all your Media through AirTunes Speakers 

~/Applications/VLC.app/Contents/MacOS/VLC -vv --sout='#transcode{acodec=alac}:raop{host=10.0.1.1,volume=15}' http://ice.somafm.com/dronezone
